org.smartfrog.services.xunit.listeners
Interface BufferingListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote, TestListenerFactory
All Known Implementing Classes:
BufferingListenerImpl
public interface BufferingListener
extends TestListenerFactory

extend buffering listener with some operations to get at the errors. It is over-chatty for a long-haul connection, but since its goal is for unit testing of the junit components, we can absorb that hit. Remember that the count of errors/failures/starts and ends increase monotically, and can do so between calls to, say, getErrorCount and getErrorInfo. Date: 07-Jul-2004 Time: 17:08:37
